title: Razor
description:
A safety razor, depicted in various colors across platforms.

Previously shown as a straight razor by Microsoft, WhatsApp, and JoyPixels.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's razor emoji features a sleek, modern design with a polished chrome finish that reflects light with exquisite detail, showcasing Apple's signature 3D shading and realistic lighting. The sharp blade is subtly suggested, giving it a precise and clean appearance. This emoji can symbolize grooming, cleanliness, or even a sharp wit, conveying a sense of tidiness and precision with the refined aesthetic found on Apple devices.
